Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Beckman Coulter AU680 automated clinical chemistry analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ARK Hydrocodone Assay, a homogeneous enzyme immunoassay for qualitative and semi-quantitative detection of hydrocodone and its metabolites in human urine.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for qualitative detection and/or semi-quantitative estimation of hydrocodone and its metabolites in human urine at a cutoff of 300 ng/mL, supporting specimen dilution for confirmatory testing and establishment of laboratory quality control procedures.
